"},{"text":"Live Catch","underlined":true},{"text":"
"},{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"When fishing, if the player reels in a fish, instead of an item, an actual fish will be launched towards the player.
The fish that spawn have 1 health (half a heart), so they will easily die."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.live_catch.1"}]}]
